service.sql: select DATEPART(mm, storage_date) yf, sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) >= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[5].months[12].date}) >= 0 and DATEPART(mm,storage_date) = 12 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId}

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[4].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[3].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[2].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[1].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_money) total from storage_yclmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select DATEPART(mm,storage_date) yf, sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) >= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[5].months[12].date}) >= 0 and DATEPART(mm,storage_date) = 12 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId}

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[4].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[3].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[2].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, storage_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[1].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, storage_date) end) ny, sum(amount_of_this_month) total from storage_bcpmx where dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, storage_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,storage_date), DATEPART(mm,storage_date)

select DATEPART(mm,complete_date) yf, sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) >= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(mm,complete_date)

select sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[5].months[12].date}) >= 0 and DATEPART(mm,complete_date) = 12 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId}

select (case when DATEPART(yy, complete_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[4].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, complete_date) end) ny, sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[4].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,complete_date), DATEPART(mm,complete_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, complete_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[3].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, complete_date) end) ny, sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[3].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,complete_date), DATEPART(mm,complete_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, complete_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[2].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, complete_date) end) ny, sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[2].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,complete_date), DATEPART(mm,complete_date)

select (case when DATEPART(yy, complete_date) = ${cal.yearBefore[1].year} then 0 else DATEPART(mm, complete_date) end) ny, sum(contract_amount) total from storage_swccptz where dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.months[12].date}) >= 0 and dateDiff(mm, complete_date, ${cal.yearBefore[1].months[12].date}) <= 0 and is_overstock = '是' and jydw = ${compId} group by DATEPART(yy,complete_date), DATEPART(mm,complete_date)

controller.list: 存货类型,月份,${cal.year - 4}年及以前,${cal.year - 3}年,${cal.year - 2}年,${cal.year - 1}年,${cal.year}年,合计
